price: Maze bavuga bati: “Karashize ingani twemere abantu babiri basanzwe nkatwe, kandi abo barungitsweko muri Bene Israyeli ari abashumba bari musi y’amategeko yacu, kandi baca bugufi kuri twebwe!”.
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ

meta.transliteration: faqālū anu'minu libasharayni mith'linā waqawmuhumā lanā ʿābidūna
